programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: Axarquia: Jasmine Harman helps Chris and Dan Boettcher from Bedfordshire find a holiday home in the Axarquia region of Spain's Costa del Sol on their budget of 70,000. They view five properties, hoping one of them will be the retreat they can escape to with their family without too much prior planning

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Costa Blanca: Engaged couple Kay Havard and Paul Young wish to buy a holiday home for romantic weekends away and to share with family and friends. Scarlette Douglas does her best to impress them with five properties on Spain's Costa Blanca for their budget of 80,000

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
In Almera, husband-and-wife team Steve and Sharon Garner help teaching duo Amanda and Paul find their perfect Spanish property, where they can enjoy their retirement. In the province of Alicante, darts enthusiast David and his wife Jane are hoping to hit the bullseye with a holiday home located close to bars and restaurants. On hand to help the duo find their dream property are sisters Sophie and Charlotte
S05E14

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
Mick and Julie's medieval hamlet has gruesome secrets buried in the walls. Norwich couple Ted and Lesa try to renovate a village in France while living in a tent. Londoner Penny is hoping to sell her beautifully restored Italian borgo

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lancashire 1/5: Dry-cleaning manager Valerie hosts the first dinner party in Lancashire, where she plans to impress her guests with a lamb hotpot and trifle. However, it remains to be seen whether her warm-hearted hospitality will be enough to win her the 1,000 prize by the end of the week

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lancashire 2/5: Dance teacher Nicky hosts the second night in Lancashire, where she hopes to impress her guests with a round-the-world themed menu inspired by her dancing tours, which includes a Chinese salmon starter, and an American dessert. However, with fellow contestant Peggy born in the United States, the host may have her work cut out in presenting the perfect dish

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

Her menu comprises tried and tested dishes, including her dessert of peach dump cake. However, friction between her and fellow contestant Steve continues to build

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lancashire 5/5: It is the final dinner party in Lancashire, and the turn of sales manager Andy to host. He is confident in his locally sourced gastro menu and delivers a meal with plenty of flair, but faces the challenge of impressing foodie Nicky. He is also under pressure to convince American Peggy of the merits of the region's food, while his fellow Lancastrians Valerie and Steve are keen to see how the area has influenced his cooking

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2023: Madeira, Portugal: Ben Hillman helps Emma and Shane from Cornwall find their dream holiday home in Madeira on a budget of 200,000

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc:

Under the watchful eye of judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith they tackle marble cake and jam roly-poly, before making a showstopping biscuit in honour of their celebrity hero. programme.title: Sarah Beeny's New Life in the Country
programme.desc:
Sarah and Graham start work on their grand plans for the outside of their home - to create a mini clock tower, complete with a bell, on the roof of the exterior building. But once it's up, they find out that it doesn't fit onto the timber housing. Sarah and Laurie also make a unique family flag and Graham personalises the weathervane

programme.title: Andrew: The Problem Prince
programme.desc:
The second of two programmes telling the inside story of Prince Andrew's 2019 Newsnight interview with Emily Maitlis and the subsequent chain of events that led to a royal disaster. In the 1980s, Andrew was a Falklands war hero and a national heart-throb, glory years that culminated in his marriage to Sarah Ferguson. programme.title: Con Air (1997)
programme.desc: Honourably discharged Army Ranger sergeant Cameron Poe hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals. When they hijack the plane in mid-flight, led by criminal mastermind Cyrus the Virus, Poe is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, US marshal Vince Larkin has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Director Simon West's blockbusting action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc:

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line

programme.desc:
With just 48 hours till extraction, Saffron and Bobby take a risk and go solo. Nik and Eva continue to taunt the hunters with a postcard from the Welsh coast but their route to the extraction point is nerve-wracking. Hunter HQ use every trick they have in the final push to catch the celebrities before they are extracted and tensions rise with close calls, a motorway pursuit and a desperate foot race as the competition comes to an adrenaline-fuelled end

programme.title: Guy Martin's Best Bits
programme.desc:

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Glasgow 3/5: Hairdresser Michelle Blackett is the host on day three in Glasgow, and hopes to impress the diners by preparing a menu of exceedingly well-appointed food. Over the course of the evening, Michelle's guests discover her hidden heritage, and hospitality student Erwin - who speaks five languages - does his best to add the 'Glaswegian' dialect to his arsenal

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
Couples try to outdo one another by throwing the perfect dinner party in Co Antrim. Newlyweds Rebecca and Gareth kick things off, attempting to add some spice to proceedings with a Mexican fiesta. Next to host are care workers Nel and Billy, who rustle up a Filipino menu. Finishing off the week are smallholders Mandy and Jim, who serve up a Filipino roast pig dish followed by baked Alaska

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

Ben Hillman needs all of his property know-how to show them five options for their 80,000 budget

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:

In Alicante, father-and-daughter duo Manuel and Sophie Rodriguez also visit ex-clients, getting a progress report from Sue and Richard, who were looking for a holiday home for their budget of 130,000 euros

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:

A hilarious evening lies in store, with unexpected tattoos, beauty tips and twerking

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Leeds 2/5: Would-be clairvoyant Janet hosts the second of a week of dinner parties in Leeds and hopes her ghoul-themed dinner party will help her win the cash prize. Part of Janet's plan is to pretend her house is haunted and she has a practical joke lined up for nursing manager Sarah and bridal shop owner Abbi to find. With more surprises in store, will the fright-night theme be enough to ghost Janet into the lead?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Leeds 3/5: Record label owner Phil hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Leeds, hoping to win the 1,000 prize money by serving up a 1970s rock-themed menu. programme.title: Come Dine with Me

Abbi continues to belittle the host - until he reveals he spends his evenings on stage impersonating a famous heart-throb singer. Will his performance bag him the top prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Leeds 5/5: Bridal shop owner Abbi hopes to woo her guests with a wedding-themed party on the final day of the competition in Leeds. All week Abbi and Michael Buble impersonator Alex have had a bit of a banter that has sailed close to the wind. Will the tension take over, or can the wedding theme create an amorous atmosphere that will help Abbi win the 1,000 prize?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Florida: Jason and Lindsay Crossland from East Yorkshire met 28 years ago when they were working for the RAF. Lindsay suffers from osteoarthritis, which affects her mobility, and as warm sunshine helps her condition their dream is to spend every school holiday in Florida with their son before eventually retiring there. They have a budget of up to 180,000, but will Ben Hillman be able to find them what they're looking for?

programme.title: Billionaire Blooms
programme.desc:
Jamie's in Venice with a limitless budget and complete creative freedom, fashioning two stunning set-ups for the wedding of one of his most treasured clients. He has assembled a squad of talented florists to help him as he transforms an ancient palazzo and a world-famous hotel. On the outskirts of Edinburgh, Ian and his team of florists attempt their biggest ever floral arch. It's just the starting point of an epic installation within a stunning castle. With so many weddings scheduled for the summer, time is the biggest pressure so there's not a moment to waste

programme.desc:

programme.title: The Kidnap of Angel Lynn
programme.desc: Using exclusive interviews, social media and immersive graphics, this documentary tells the story of the abusive relationship that led to the life-altering abduction of Angel Lynn. At just 18 years-old, Angel met her boyfriend through a mutual friend and he rapidly became abusive towards her, isolating her and ultimately abducting her. After being forced into a van, Angel fell from the back of the speeding vehicle and was left on the side of the road with near-fatal injuries that left her unable to walk, speak or feed herself. Her story is retold as she learns to live again

Ryan who is 28 and from Cheltenham, is looking for his Mr Right. As a sucker for a silver fox and a dad bod, can he find his dream guy to wake up to every morning?

Plus, a jar of pickled pig foetuses and an array of Buzzcocks memorabilia

programme.desc: A group of resistance radio operators must evade capture while trying to broadcast a message of hope to their fellow freedom fighters. Drama, starring Cary Elwes and Judd Hirsch

programme.desc: When his tools are stolen, a divorced, down-on-his-luck handyman and his young son attempt to track down the culprits. Comedy, starring Clive Owen, Jaeden Lieberher and Maria Bello

programme.title: Cat's Eye (1985)
programme.desc: Anthology of chilling tales by Stephen King, comprising the stories of a man who gets more than he bargained for when he employs a sinister agency to help him give up smoking, a gambler who sets his wife's lover a deadly challenge and a girl terrorised by a troll living in her bedroom wall. Drew Barrymore, James Woods, Robert Hays and Candy Clark star

programme.title: Killerman (2019)
programme.desc: When a money launderer in New York City wakes up with millions in stolen cash and drugs, and no memory of how he got it, he sets out to find answers - but a crew of dirty cops are after him. Action drama, starring Liam Hemsworth, Emory Cohen and Diane Guerrero

programme.title: Driven (2018)
programme.desc: The meteoric rise of the golden boy of the automotive industry, John DeLorean, and his iconic DeLorean Motor Company, told through the eyes of his friendship with charming, ex-con pilot-turned-FBI informant Jim Hoffman, which ultimately leads to his downfall. Drama, starring Jason Sudeikis and Lee Pace

programme.title: The Heist (2009)
programme.desc: Roger, a security guard working at an American museum, discovers several pieces from a collection he has defended for more than a decade are due to be sold to a gallery in Denmark. Chief among them is The Lonely Maiden, a painting he has grown to adore during his years of service. Determined to stop the sale from taking place, he enlists the aid of two like-minded guards in a desperate mission to steal the artworks they have come to love. Crime comedy, starring Christopher Walken, Morgan Freeman and William H Macy

programme.title: Cracks (2009)
programme.desc: A nonconformist teacher at a girls' boarding school in Thirties Britain is an outsider among her colleagues but adored by her pupils. When a Spanish student who also revels in her outsider status arrives, the teacher becomes dangerously fascinated with her, sparking uncontrollable jealousy among the pupils. Drama, starring Eva Green and Juno Temple

programme.title: Zulu (2013)
programme.desc: Two South African police officers, one black and one white, investigate the murder of a teenage girl. The case brings to light the lingering consequences of apartheid, and forces both men to face up to their own roles in their country's brutal history. Crime drama based on Caryl Ferey's novel, with Forest Whitaker and Orlando Bloom

programme.title: Eye for an Eye (2019)
programme.desc: Carson Phillips is a former football star-turned-private eye who rarely goes out of town on a case. When a client hires him to find her aunt in Galveston, Texas, the lure of visiting his old hometown proves too great. However, the seemingly normal missing persons case reveals a complex web of crimes with a dead body at the centre. Mystery thriller, starring John Travolta, Morgan Freeman and Brendan Fraser

programme.title: Trumbo (2015)
programme.desc: Biopic of the acclaimed Hollywood screenwriter Dalton Trumbo, who was jailed and blacklisted in the 1940s for his left-wing political views. On his release from prison, he manages to continue writing using a series of pseudonyms, and his newfound success leads many to question the validity of the blacklist. Biopic of the writer, starring Bryan Cranston, Diane Lane and Helen Mirren
